Do you have any question? Feel free to r: Do you have any question? Feel free to reach out.
Name: Name
IreneIntroText: I'm your ADHD-friendly digital coach. I turn scattered to-do lists into structured rituals, keep score of your momentum, and check in with warmth instead of pressure.
IreneMiddleContent: Treat your day like a playlist: plan, act, reflect, repeat. Irene pairs conversational planning with adaptive reminders so momentum always feels attainable.
IreneAboutText: I fuse dopamine-friendly interfaces with strategic thinking so you can enjoy the ride while still shipping meaningful work.
IreneSocialContent: Swipe through your wins, drafts, and rituals as if you were scrolling a feed. Irene keeps links, notes, and energy levels neatly stacked for quick reflection.
IreneChessContent: When you're stuck, I surface the next best activity the way a chess engine highlights movesâ€”clear options without judgement.
HireIreneSubtitle: First two weeks of every plan are free. Cancel anytime.
IreneContactContent: If your use case isn't listed or you need a bespoke integration, send a message and we'll tailor Irene to your workflow.

IrenePlans.StarterBulletFour: Adaptive scheduling that flexes with your day.
IrenePlans.MessageTemplate: Hello, I want the {{plan}} subscription plan.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
intro: SYSTEIN Solutions ("SYSTEIN", "we", "our") is a sole proprietorship established in the Netherlands. This Privacy Policy describes how we process personal data in connection with our AI-based products and services, including the AI coaching system Coach Irene, in line with the GDPR and Dutch law.

sections.title: Data Controller
paragraphs: SYSTEIN Solutions â€“ Eenmanszaak
De Lismortel 42 366, 5612 AR Eindhoven, The Netherlands
Email: info@systein.nl
Website: www.systein.nl

sections.title: Categories of Personal Data
paragraphs: Depending on how you interact with us we may process the following data:
list: Identification and contact data such as name and email address
Account and subscription data
Information you provide via forms, email, or other communication channels
Interaction data generated when you use AI-based services such as Coach Irene
Technical data (for example IP address and timestamp) stored in server logs

sections.title: Purposes of Processing
paragraphs: We process personal data for the following purposes:
list: Providing and maintaining our services, including AI-based coaching
Managing subscriptions, billing, and payment administration
Responding to questions, feedback, and support requests
Monitoring system security and preventing abuse
Complying with legal obligations

sections.title: Legal Bases
paragraphs: We rely on different legal bases depending on the context:
list: Performance of a contract (Article 6(1)(b) GDPR)
Compliance with legal obligations (Article 6(1)(c) GDPR)
Legitimate interests such as service security and improvement (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR)
Consent where explicitly requested (Article 6(1)(a) GDPR)

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
paragraphs: We do not use cookies or similar tracking technologies for analytics or marketing. Our servers only register technical logs, such as IP address and access time, for security and diagnostic purposes.

sections.title: Data Retention
paragraphs: Personal data is kept only for as long as necessary for the purposes described or as required by law. AI interaction data is anonymised or pseudonymised where possible. Financial and invoicing records may be retained for at least seven years to comply with Dutch tax regulations.

sections.title: Data Sharing
paragraphs: We do not sell your personal data. Limited data may be shared with trusted partners when necessary to provide the services:
All processors are bound by written data processing agreements that comply with GDPR requirements.
list: Payment service providers that process subscription payments
Hosting and infrastructure providers that help us operate our services
Public authorities when required by law or court order

sections.title: International Transfers
paragraphs: Where personal data is transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA) we implement appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses or equivalent mechanisms required by EU law.

sections.title: Your Rights
paragraphs: You have the following rights under the GDPR:
list: Right of access to your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data
Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten") under certain conditions
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to certain processing activities
Right to withdraw consent at any time where processing is based on consent

sections.title: Contact for Privacy Requests
paragraphs: You can exercise your rights or raise concerns by emailing info@systein.nl. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Dutch Data Protection Authority (Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens).

sections.title: AI-Specific Information
paragraphs: Coach Irene is an AI-based coaching tool and does not provide medical, psychological, therapeutic, or diagnostic services. Outputs generated by the AI may be incomplete, inaccurate, or inappropriate for your personal situation. You remain responsible for decisions made on the basis of AI outputs and should not use the service as a substitute for professional medical or psychological care.

sections.title: Security Measures
paragraphs: We take reasonable technical and organisational measures to protect personal data against unauthorised access, loss, misuse, or alteration. However, no system can be guaranteed to be fully secure.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
paragraphs: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The most recent version will always be available on our website. Continued use of our services after an update constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
intro: These Terms and Conditions apply to all offers, quotations, subscriptions, agreements, and services provided by SYSTEIN Solutions ("SYSTEIN"), unless expressly agreed otherwise in writing.

sections.title: Definitions
list: "SYSTEIN": SYSTEIN Solutions, a sole proprietorship established in the Netherlands.
"Client": any natural or legal person who purchases or uses services from SYSTEIN.
"Services": all AI-related software, coaching systems, subscriptions, and consultancy provided by SYSTEIN.
"Product": the AI-based coaching system known as "Coach Irene".
"Agreement": any contract or subscription between SYSTEIN and the Client.

sections.title: Scope
paragraphs: These Terms and Conditions govern every use of our services unless another written agreement explicitly states otherwise.

sections.title: Nature of Services and AI Disclaimer
paragraphs: Coach Irene and related AI services are intended to provide AI-generated suggestions and structure for productivity.
list: The services do not constitute medical, psychological, therapeutic, legal, or financial advice.
AI outputs may be incomplete, inaccurate, or inappropriate.
Clients remain responsible for their own decisions and actions taken on the basis of AI outputs.
The services are not a substitute for professional medical or psychological treatment or diagnosis.

sections.title: Subscription, Payment, and Refunds
list: Services are offered on a monthly subscription basis unless otherwise agreed in writing.
Subscription fees are payable in advance at the start of each billing period.
If payment is not received on time, SYSTEIN may suspend or terminate access to the services.
Subscription fees are non-refundable once the billing period has started.
No partial refunds are granted for unused days or early termination within a billing period.
The Client is responsible for any taxes, levies, or charges imposed by authorities.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
list: All intellectual property rights in the software, models, prompts, documentation, and configurations remain with SYSTEIN or its licensors.
Clients receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable licence to use the services for internal purposes during the term of the agreement.
Clients may not copy, modify, reverse engineer, resell, sublicense, or otherwise commercially exploit the services without prior written permission.

sections.title: Availability and Maintenance
list: SYSTEIN aims to provide the services with reasonable care and skill but does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.
Maintenance or updates may temporarily affect availability. Where reasonable, such maintenance will be scheduled to minimise impact.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
list: SYSTEIN is only liable for direct damages resulting from intent or gross negligence.
SYSTEIN is not liable for indirect or consequential damages, including loss of profit, data, or business interruption.
Total aggregate liability is limited to the fees paid by the client in the three months preceding the event giving rise to liability.
Nothing in these Terms limits liability where limitation is not permitted by law.

sections.title: Term and Termination
list: Subscriptions run for an indefinite period with monthly billing unless stated otherwise.
Clients may terminate the subscription at any time with effect from the next billing period.
SYSTEIN may terminate or suspend access with immediate effect if the client fails to meet payment obligations, misuses the services, or materially breaches these Terms.

sections.title: Force Majeure
paragraphs: SYSTEIN is not liable for failure or delay caused by circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including network failures, power outages, strikes, pandemics, or acts of government.

sections.title: Applicable Law and Disputes
list: These Terms and all agreements are governed by the laws of the Netherlands.
Disputes are submitted to the competent court in the district of Oost-Brabant, unless mandatory law prescribes otherwise.

sections.title: Changes to These Terms
paragraphs: SYSTEIN may amend these Terms and Conditions from time to time. The updated version will be published on the website. Continued use of the services after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

imprint.title: Legal Notice
intro: SYSTEIN Solutions â€“ Eenmanszaak is responsible for this website and the AI-based services offered through it.
The information below fulfils the legal notice (Imprint) requirements under Dutch law.

sections.title: Business Details
list: De Lismortel 42 366, 5612 AR Eindhoven, The Netherlands
Business structure: Sole proprietorship (eenmanszaak)
Jurisdiction: The Netherlands

sections.title: Contact
list: Email: info@systein.nl
Website: www.systein.nl

sections.title: Purpose of the Website
paragraphs: SYSTEIN provides AI-based software and related services, including the AI coaching system Coach Irene. All information on this website is provided for general informational purposes only and may be changed without notice.

sections.title: Disclaimer
paragraphs: Although we strive to keep the information on this website accurate and up to date, SYSTEIN makes no warranties regarding the completeness, accuracy, reliability, or availability of the website or the information contained on it. Use of the website and services is at your own risk.

sections.title: AI Disclaimer
paragraphs: AI-generated outputs may be inaccurate, incomplete, or inappropriate. The website and services do not provide medical, psychological, legal, or financial advice and do not replace professional care or consultation.

sections.title: Liability
paragraphs: SYSTEIN is not liable for damages arising from or related to the use of this website or the services, except where liability cannot be excluded under applicable law.
